H0.text: What is a positively charged ion called. Cationic

H1.text: What is a positively charged ion called. Positron

H2.text: What is a positively charged ion called. Protonic

H3.text: What is a positively charged ion called. Ion

A4.text: A cation is a positively charged ion with fewer electrons than protons (e.g. K+ (potassium ion))

A5.text: The net electric charge on an ion is equal to the number of protons in the ion minus the number of electrons.
